10 |     runs-on: ubuntu-20.04
  |       ^~~~~~~~~~~
.github/workflows/deploy.yml:15:9: invalid CRON format "* * * *" in schedule event: expected exactly 5 fields, got 4 [syntax-check]
  |
15 |         - cron: "* * * *"
  |           ^~~~
.github/workflows/deploy.yml:22:15: "actions/checkout@v2" is using deprecated Node.js 12. the action should update to use Node.js 16 or later [action-version]
  |
22 |       - uses: actions/checkout@v2
